scripts.serve: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { if (req.url === '/') { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'}); res.end(fs.readFileSync('./dist/resume.html')); } else if (req.url === '/resume.pdf') { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'application/pdf'}); res.end(fs.readFileSync('./dist/resume.pdf')); } }); server.listen(3000, () => console.log('Resume available at http://localhost:3000'));"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
